ygData.subject: Re: enchant armor
ygData.msgSnippet: This is not really a warrior answer, but.... I think that the only metals you can enchant are the precious metals - and the only things you can make from
ygData.messageBody:
This is not really a warrior answer, but....

I think that the only metals you can enchant are the precious metals - and
the only things you can make from enchanted metal are jewelry items.

http://www.baelish.aust.com/everquest/
<http://www.baelish.aust.com/everquest/>

There is the possibility for a future version to allow enchanting of metals
used to make armor and weapons. But right now - either you cant do it or
nobody knows how. At least as far as I know.

Snyak.

-----Original Message-----
From: mark mark [mailto:markerob@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 23, 1999 11:14 AM
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] enchant armor

From: mark mark <markerob@...>


This is not really a warrior question, but you guys might
know how to do it.
I have an enchanter friend who would like to enchant ore
in order to make
magical armor. We have looked forever trying to find the
spell to enchant
ore but can't. I'm sure you guys can understand the
importance of magical
armor. Anyway we want to make it to sell cheap to other
players. If anyone
has played around with this or knows anything about it
please tell.

Arathorne, Solsek Ro
